words.definition: To abandon something is to leave it forever or for a long time.
words.example: The old room had been abandoned years ago.

words.definition: If you are ambitious, you want to be real successful.
words.example: Kendra had to be ambitious to get into medical school.

words.definition: When a dog barks, it makes a short, loud noise.
words.example: The dog barked at the stranger.

words.definition: A bay is an area near the ocean where the land goes inward.
words.example: The GS the boats were anchored in the bay.

words.definition: If someone is brilliant, they are very smart.
words.example: My Gs sister is a brilliant student.

words.definition: Your chin is the hard part at the bottom of your face.
words.example: Luke put his hand on his chin and thought.

words.definition: A complaint is something you say when you are unhappy about something.
words.example: Mom Gs said she had a complaint about the service.

words.definition: When someone is deaf, they cannot hear.
words.example: The GS Susan was born deaf.

words.definition: To be enthusiastic about something is to be excited by it.
words.example: The GS the children were enthusiastic about going to the zoo.

words.definition: An expedition is a long trip, usually to a place very few people have been.
words.example: They went on an expedition to the North Pole.

words.definition: The horizon is where the sky looks like it meets the ground.
words.example: The GS the sun was sinking below the horizon.

words.definition: To be loyal to something or someone is to agree to always help them.
words.example: The GS he is a loyal friend.

words.definition: The mayor is the person in charge of a city.
words.example: The GS the mayor gave a speech to the people.

words.definition: If something is mutual, it is felt in the same way by two or more people.
words.example: The GS they have a mutual interest in music.

words.definition: If someone is overweight, they are heavier than is healthy.
words.example: The GS he became overweight because he ate too much.

words.definition: A refuge is a place where you go to be safe from something.
words.example: When it started to rain, we found refuge in a cave.

words.definition: To restore something is to fix it or make it the way it was before.
words.example: The GS he restored the old car.

words.definition: To rub something is to push on it with your hand and move it back and forth.
words.example: The GS he rubbed his eyes because he was tired.

words.definition: Your senses are how you see, hear, smell, taste and feel things.
words.example: The GS human beings have five senses.

words.definition: A veterinarian is a doctor that takes care of animals.
words.example: Wanda became a veterinarian because she loves dogs.
